alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 12:17PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Nye and south central White Pine Counties through 1245 PM PDT... At 1216 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles west of Preston, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Nye and south central White Pine Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; White Pine County
